programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: On this episode, Antinarcotics officials at Jorge Chavez International Airport in Lima, Peru, face a potentially dramatic situation: a woman is arrested trying to smuggle cocaine while traveling with her two young children. Also, the detention of an elderly man reveals that drug cartels are looking for new carrier profiles. A young woman breaks down into tears when she is detained for what is apparently illegal trafficking, while a young man who was formerly imprisoned for drug trafficking in the United Arab Emirates raises the agents suspicions, who decide to interrogate him.At the loading docks, a typical Peruvian handicraft turns out to be the package of a pilot drug shipment, and a Chinese citizen who tried to evade security controls to traffic maca bulbs must face the consequences of his actions.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: When the human remains of a female are uncovered near Vejle, Denmark, an archeologist begins detailing a fantastic tale of who she was and why she was murdered, linking her to ancient sagas and even King Harald Bluetooth! But as the archeology study evolves, a rival archeologist has another theory on whose body this is and why her death occurred in the first place.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Near Silkeborg, Denmark, peat diggers uncover a human head and authorities quickly work to identify who it is, possibly relating it a missing boy in the area. But a keen police officer reveals the body is much older than the current missing person and calls the museum to investigate. What is discovered during the excavation is a perfectly preserved person, posed in the most interesting and peaceful way. Could this positioning be a clue to how and why they he was murdered?

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Human remains are pulled up from the depths of a peat bog near Yde, Netherlands. Some locals believe it is the work of the devilstrands of shocking fire-red hair stream from the ground, sending them fleeing in fear. But as archeologists study the human remains further, they realize they belong to a young woman whose death is more chilling than they ever imagined.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear Grylls takes singer-actress Cynthia Erivo to the highest mountains in Wales, where Bear trained in the British Special Forces. Bear teaches Cynthia how to rappel into and navigate a labyrinth of caves before they traverse a frigid and thunderous waterfall. On day two Cynthia uses the skills she learned on day one to embark on her own, find Bear, and make it to their extraction.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear takes his first deaf guest, Academy Award winning actor Troy Kotsur, on an adventure in the Scottish Highlands. Bear and Troy must find a new way to communicate as they push themselves to the limits traversing perilously steep mountains and raging rivers, but its the silence that builds their strongest bond.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With Brazils Chapecoense soccer team on board, LaMia Flight 2933 is on its final approach to Medellin, Columbia when the crew suddenly declares a fuel emergency. Before air traffic control even has time to clear a path, the plane crashes on the crest of a mountain, killing nearly everyone on board. With the soccer world in mourning, investigators face incredible pressure to figure out what happened. And as they pore over the evidence, they uncover a disturbing tale of greed and a deadly gamble.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Find out why these tealeaves get to lie down on the job; this hoisin sauce is popular with Chinese astronauts; and these ice cream sandwiches have been a San Francisco tradition since 1928.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Superstructures: Mega Carriers
programme.desc: Venture inside the worlds most giant-sized transporters. Watch a mega-sized cargo ship take a massive shipment across the world, soar to new heights on a giant airplane, and explore outer space on a super-sized space station. With the help of world-class engineers, architects and construction teams; experience game changing innovation layer by layer and everything thats hidden inside.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Embark on a thrilling journey through Spains greatest feats of engineering. From the awe-inspiring technology thats bringing Barcelonas iconic Sagrada Familia to completion, to the secrets of Sevilles record-breaking wooden sun shade. Marvel at a gravity-defying skyscraper that seems to hover in the sky, and step back in time as a 2,000-year-old Roman theatre is nursed back to life.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Venture into the heart of Polands most awe-inspiring engineering marvels. Watch as a super port rises from the depths of the sea, and uncover the secrets behind the tallest building in the European Union. Descend into the shadows beneath Wieliczka, where a sprawling city-sized mine lies hidden, then witness the towering legacy of the worlds tallest wooden structure.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This series of spectacular aerial journeys reveal Europes most remarkable nations as theyve never been seen before. From erupting volcanoes in Iceland, to pristine Roman amphitheaters in Croatia and riding record breaking waves in Portugal. This all access aerial documentary lays bare the traditions, innovations and engineering breakthroughs that continue to shape these great modern nations today.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This spectacular aerial trip reveals the Greek Islands as they have never been seen before. Flying cameras uncover the majestic beauty of the Santorini skyline, a summer festival with a fiery twist on the island of Spetses, and a visit to the island of Hydra where mules replace vehicles. Well take a trip to an island with a uniquely Greek harvest, and fly over the fearsome defences of Corfus Venetian fortress.

programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: This brand new series reveals the extraordinary feats of engineering hidden inside the worlds most spectacular man-made constructions. From the worlds biggest plane and largest free-spanning dome to the tallest building and the largest space ship, each superstructure is taken apart using state-of-the-art CGI and insight from world class specialists to reveal the startling innovations that turn it from dream to reality.

programme.title: Superstructures: Mega Carriers
programme.desc: Venture inside the worlds most giant-sized transporters. Watch a mega-sized cargo ship take a massive shipment across the world, soar to new heights on a giant airplane, and explore outer space on a super-sized space station. With the help of world-class engineers, architects and construction teams; experience game changing innovation layer by layer and everything thats hidden inside.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Ireland doesnt take up much room on the map, but few places have such a celebrated identity; over 70 million people around the world claim Irish heritage. Hannah Fry goes beyond the pubs and parades to discover what it really means to be Irish today. Along the windswept coast of Donegal Bay, she dives into Irelands surprising surfing scene, where dramatic geology is forging a new bond with the sea. She places a bet at the Punchestown races, exploring how a connection to the land became a multi-billion Euro industry. In a moment of personal discovery, Hannah uncovers her own Irish DNA and how her family history holds clues to Irish identity. As her journey ends, Hannah steps into the spotlight to try her hand at one of Irelands most cherished traditions: storytelling.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry visits Iceland to discover how this stark, treeless island became a global success story. On the geologically active Reykjanes Peninsula, she meets scientists whose lava-flow predictions saved the world-famous Blue Lagoon spa from destruction, and in Hengill she sees how a futuristic algae farm is fuelled by geothermal power - and imagination. A dip in the countrys oldest swimming pool reveals how Icelands unusually small gene pool is helping advance global health, while a horseback ride across a black sand landscape immortalised in the Icelandic sagas shows how Viking heritage continues to inspire creativity. The Icelanders Hannah encounters dont just live on the land; they negotiate with it. Their collective determination and adaptability has forged an island of ideas - and a tourist magnet the world cannot resist.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Emergency at Toronto International Airport when a flight carrying 80 passengers and crew crashes on landing on runway 23. As the airport goes into an immediate ground stop, cancelling all outbound flights and diverting incoming aircraft, the teams on the ground are pushed to their limit trying to manage the chaos that ensues when you close Canadas busiest airport.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Korean Air Cargo Flight #8509 Boeing 747-Freighter Scheduled to return to Seoul via Milan, Italy, Korean Air Cargo Flight #8509 idles on the tarmac at Englands Stansted Airport. With a new crew on board and nearly an hour behind schedule, the aircraft finally takes off and climbs to 2,500 feet. But just a few seconds later, the plane banks sharply to the left and slams into a field northeast of London. All four crewmembers die instantly in the huge explosion and a massive crater 30 feet deep marks the point of impact. It is Korean Airlines fifth major accident in two-and-a-half years and as investigators unravel the case, their search for answers leads them to back Korea.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Explorer Albert Lin searches Israel for the lost city of the Canaanites, a mysterious civilisation who survived a biblical era, climate apocalypse. The expedition takes him scuba diving for 4000-year-old shipwreck treasure and through a terrifying incident on a crumbling cliff face. Using extraordinary tech, Albert reveals a spectacular maritime world, built by these ancient climate survivors.

programme.title: Lost Cities Revealed with Albert Lin
programme.desc: First century AD and the Romans dominate much of the known world. But their plans to conquer Scotland are foiled by a band of barbarian insurgents called the Picts. Explorer, Albert Lin scales sea cliffs, explores caverns, swims rapids and uses high-tech scanners to discover a lost kingdom that may answer how the mysterious Picts were behind one of the greatest military upsets of their time.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Chess-playing computers are nothing new today, but how did a robot beat the worlds best chess players back in 1770? Is this the worlds first artificial intelligence, or is there sleight of hand at play? Charles Lindbergh was arguably the worlds most famous man in the 1930s, as the first to fly non-stop across the Atlantic and then have his son tragically kidnapped. Lesser known is his invention of a singular glass pump of elegant design. What is it for? A 2,400-year-old mummy is brought from Egypt to Croatia by a collector. Only after it is donated to a museum does anyone realize that this mummy is wrapped in the rarest remnant of a lost language. The writing on the wrappings is pored over by experts to decipher it. What does it say?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Towering 13 feet tall and over 11,000 years old, the Vulture Stone is a mysterious message from the end of the Ice Age, one of many relief carvings found at the site of Gobekli Tepe in Turkey. What can its strange depictions of birds, a scorpion and a headless man mean? A disturbing dome-like mask with a box where the mouth should be is the legacy of 1920s inventor and sci-fi writer Hugo Gernsback. His goal was peace and quiet on demand, but did he instead pre-empt the medical and torture applications of sensory deprivation? In a Swiss church stands a fearsome skeleton clothed in a suit of armor that is as exotic as it is impractical. Who would go to the trouble of creating such an ornately macabre work of art, and whose skeleton is it?

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Emergency at Toronto International Airport when a flight carrying 80 passengers and crew crashes on landing on runway 23. As the airport goes into an immediate ground stop, cancelling all outbound flights and diverting incoming aircraft, the teams on the ground are pushed to their limit trying to manage the chaos that ensues when you close Canadas busiest airport.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: A huge winter storm slams into Toronto International Airport. The Airfield Inspector unit urgently tracks down a blown-over sign before it becomes a hazard. The airport is down to one runway as snow ploughs clear the other. They have 15 minutes before snow makes the live runway unsafe. A jack-knifed Boeing 787 throws operations into chaos. Final

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney is experiencing one of the rainiest seasons on record. With violent storms closing down 2 runways, an incoming flight relays a distress call to the Integrated Operations Centre. A man has suffered an apparent heart attack on board. Will the plane be able to land in this weather? Later, a fire training drill turns into a real emergency as an on board fire is reported from another plane.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With weekend vacationers and commuters returning home, Friday is always a busy day at the airport. More passengers means more problems, keeping the Duty Managers on high alert. Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: A huge winter storm slams into Toronto International Airport. The Airfield Inspector unit urgently tracks down a blown-over sign before it becomes a hazard. The airport is down to one runway as snow ploughs clear the other. They have 15 minutes before snow makes the live runway unsafe. A jack-knifed Boeing 787 throws operations into chaos. Final

programme.title: Ocean Wreck Investigation
programme.desc: This episode tells the stories of two shocking revenge attacks in WW2. In 1944, in retaliation for Pearl Harbor, the Americans launched a massive aerial bombardment of the Japanese fleet in the Pacific - andin the Baltic; the most shocking attack in Maritime history. The German liner Wilhelm Gustloff was torpedoed by a Russian submarine, with the loss of some 10,000 people.

programme.title: Ocean Wreck Investigation
programme.desc: In the wake of WWI, 74 of the most powerful warships of the German High Seas fleet disappear into the depths of Scapa Flow. We follow maritime archaeologists and historians on an investigation to interrogate the motives, actions, and outcome of the greatest scuttle and act of defiance in wartime history. Witness testimony and CGI brings to life both the scuttle and 20th century salvage operations.

programme.title: Ocean Wreck Investigation
programme.desc: The sea is unpredictable. Critical decisions made in the face of danger make all the difference. What sank the ocean liner Empress of Ireland, causing Canadas worst maritime tragedy? And the enigma of the ship El Faro, lost with all hands. Armed with the latest undersea technology and personal testimony, we climb aboard these doomed ships to discover what set them on the path to catastrophe.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Reality series in which professional rigger, adventure junkie and science geek Sean Riley participates in various tough fixes- repairs and renovations done on equipment that is very large or dangerous. He will work with other specialized engineers and experts in order to tackle some uniquely difficult jobs such as a pressure dome replacement for an Air Seychelles Boeing 767-300ER, fixing of a cruise ships power generator in Grand Bahama Island, replacing a bridge in Utah, replacement of a nuclear turbine in Susquehanna Steam Electric Station, and many other grand and tough jobs.

programme.title: Worlds Toughest Fixes
programme.desc: Hang on tight and dont look down as Worlds Toughest Fixes scales the iconic bridges of the UK: the world-famous Tower Bridge in London, and two bridges in Scotland -- the historic Forth Bridge and, right next door, the Forth Road Bridge. Its three bridges, three big problems, three tough fixes. In London, its the famous Tower Bridge, with a serious lead contamination problem. In Scotland, its all high access. Riley will help construct scaffolding from the top down, 367 feet above the water, dangling on a pole over speeding trains. And on an aging suspension bridge, Rileys rappelling down a 296-foot suspender cable, swinging in mid-air to run data cables to a high-tech monitoring system. Its a tour of some of the biggest fixes across the pond, meeting the men who are taking on the hazards to get the job done, on Worlds Toughest Fixes.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to the Shetland Islands, a high-tech turboprop is struck by lightning, temporarily blinding the crew and disabling their controls. The pilots declare a Mayday as the plane plunges into a terrifying nosedive. Just seconds before impact, they manage to regain control. And once theyre safely on the ground, investigators uncover an unusual feature in the plane that plays a key role in this calamity.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Easter Islands tall stone moai have long captured the global imagination, and there are still mysteries surrounding them. Out of nearly 1,000, why is one particular moai, called Tukuturi, the only one kneeling and sporting a beard? In 1950s USA, sightings of UFOs were a national phenomenon. Alien or not, many Americans didnt realize that the US military was working their own flying saucer: the Avrocar. And just after Newtons discoveries about gravity, 18th-century German physician Franz Anton Mesmer also proposed an invisible force that he called ""animal magnetism." To harness it, he built a device from a giant wooden tub saying it could cure any illness. Patients seemed to corroborate the claim, but could it be true?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Under the muck of a Danish bog, a 2,400-year-old body is found so perfectly preserved the stubble on the dead mans chin is visible … as is the rope around his neck. Is this ancient cold case what it seems? At the turn of the 20th century, physician Albert Abrams was inspired to apply the new discovery of radio waves to medicine. He invented a complex-looking machine to diagnose any disease. Thousands flocked to be tested, but the establishment was skeptical. At Berlins Neues Museum, a bust of Egypts Queen Nefertiti portrays a woman so stunning that she has become synonymous with flawless beauty. But when experts use advanced techniques to look beneath the surface, new questions are raised about the queens appearance.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The lost colony of Roanoke is a historic mystery that has not been solved for over 400 years. An intriguing artifact was discovered in 1937: the Dare Stone. Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Venture into the heart of Polands most awe-inspiring engineering marvels. Watch as a super port rises from the depths of the sea, and uncover the secrets behind the tallest building in the European Union. Descend into the shadows beneath Wieliczka, where a sprawling city-sized mine lies hidden, then witness the towering legacy of the worlds tallest wooden structure.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Dive into the awe-inspiring world of Dutch engineering, where human ingenuity meets the relentless power of nature. From a remarkable sideways ship launch, to the nations largest flood barrier, each stop reveals a story of engineering innovation. Then, step back in time to uncover the ingenious, water management secrets hidden within the iconic windmills of Kinderdijk.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Atlantis Rising
programme.desc: Executive Produced by James Cameron, "Atlantis Discovered" is a 1x120 detective thriller that seeks out, uncovers and explores artifacts such as archaeological finds, satellite photographs, manuscripts hiding in plain sight, underwater exploration, etc. and attempt to "decode" the artifacts as springboards to further the investigation to get to the bottom of the story.

programme.title: Architects of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Throughout human history, architecture has served to showcase power and express meaning. But buildings also keep secrets. By accident, and by design, whole cities were written in invisible ink, kept safe from the prying eyes of outsiders. This program explores why ancient people riddled their most impressive creations with secrets, and how modern scientists are learning to uncover them.

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Archaeologist Kathleen Martinez is leading a thrilling detective hunt on land and underwater, to unearth the final pieces of the puzzle that will unlock the story of Cleopatras last days. Armed with the latest technology and the unparalleled skills of explorer Bob Ballard, she is guaranteed to make extraordinary discoveries. This could be the find of the century: Cleopatras Lost Tomb.

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: Sally Ride became the first American woman to blast off into space, but beneath her unflappable composure, she carried a secret. Revealing the romance and sacrifices of their 27 years together, Sallys life partner, Tam OShaughnessy, tells the full story of this complicated and iconic astronaut for the first time. SALLY is directed by Emmy Award-winning filmmaker Cristina Costantini.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: a Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: In his most personal documentary yet, Chris turns the camera on his own family after his dads recent Alzheimers diagnosis. They embark on a road trip into their past, exploring the science of social connection and how it can support memory function. They revisit meaningful places and faces, capturing it all as a home movie, and reviving treasured recollections.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: One students dreams of becoming a fighter pilot are put in jeopardy as the class starts advanced phase training with a set of breathtaking bombing tests. Diving at speeds theyve never faced before, students struggle with the dynamic moves and start to make high-risk mistakes. Instructors deliver tough assessments in the debriefs to keep the students safe.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Landing on an aircraft carrier demands precision flying and is a skill vital for all U.S. Navy fighter pilots. As the students tackle the longest and most technical section of the advanced phase, they know its a test they must pass to keep their dreams alive. The pressure mounts on some struggling students, and the commanding officer issues a timely warning to one.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. programme.title: Europes New Wild
programme.desc: This stunning six-part nature series tells the inspiring story of the rebirthing of the wild regions of the continent of Europe. A land formerly full of diverse wildlife and contrasting landscapes, Europe was in need of special rewilding teams to embark on a mission to return species to their natural habitat and this series focuses on six regions that have benefitted from the project. The Carpathian Mountains of Romania have seen the reintroduction of European bison while rural depopulation in Spain and Portugal offers up the opportunity to expand the wild nature of the Iberian Peninsula. The teams also look at how bears and humans can live peacefully, side by side and explores the myriad creatures that call the Danube Delta home. The unique culture and atmosphere of Lapland plays host to distinctive wildlife and the Sámi people and a natural balance is being restored to the Balkans.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Race to Winter
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. As the first light of spring touches snow-covered landscapes, the race begins. Across fjords, forests, mountains and tundra, animals emerge from hiding to take advantage of summers fleeting generosity.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Cheetah. A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves, for a muddy encounter with a feisty mud crab, a shovel-nosed ray that he catches bare-handed and a mosquito, well quite a lot of mosquitoes that almost eat him alive.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads to the mysterious blue depths to discover which animal dominates the sea. His first encounter is with a tiger shark, the notorious hunter shaped like a torpedo and armed with ferocious teeth! Next, Phil dives with a group of magnificent manta rays and listens to the songs of one of the largest creatures on Earth, the majestic humpback whale.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Cheetah. A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Sixth Sense. To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Lion. A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: Crocodile. A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Sixth Sense. To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.desc: Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland for some island-hopping fun and encounters a green sea turtle laying her eggs, a pack of wild dingoes on the hunt and a snake with a terrifying name - death adder, lying in ambush.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Phil Breslin visits the savannah for an encounter with Australias largest predatory bird, a wedge-tailed Eagle, one of the worlds most venomous snakes - the coastal taipan and a real-life dragon - the frill-necked lizard.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bizonu bars migrē caur Celtnieklīci un traucas tieši pretī Rātsnamam. Rabla komanda izmanto lielos braucamos, lai glābtu pilsētu. Komanda izmanto milzīgos braucamos, lai palīdzētu Lūkasam un Lilijai dāvāt vecākiem lieliskāko kāzu gadadienu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Netālu no Celtnieklīča parka reindžere Roza un Rabla komanda atklāj meteorītu. Kad Ātrmeistars un Megameistars mēģina to piesavināties, ķepaiņi izmanto savus milzīgos braucamos, lai izglābtu pilsētu un nogādātu meteorītu uz Zinātnes centru.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Megameistars izaicina mēru Greitveju piedalīties triku sacensībās, Rabla komanda būvē satriecošas triku rampas. Kad elektrības traucējumi apdraud Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu, ķepaiņi izmanto lielos braucamos, lai atgrieztu elektrību.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoras parkā notiks ikgadējais jautrais skrējiens, bet Padingtons nav formā, tāpēc Bērdas kundze izlemj trenēt viņu. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons nejauši salauž Bērdas kundzes šūpuļkrēslu. Kā viņi to salabos, lai viņa neuzzinātu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz savai draudzenei kondorei Katalīnai kļūt par lielisku gauču un izglābt Gaučo spēles. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vienradžu princesi Pilaru un palīdz viņai atgriezties Vienradžu zemē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek Garnadzi un viņa krustdēlu Foksiju. Viņiem jānokļūst mājās, pirms Garnadzis un Foksijs pagūst nočiept spēļu lācīti. Dora satiek Zābaciņa māsīcu Cepurīti, un viņi dodas lietusmežā, lai meklētu īpašos zilos banānus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata krokodilu bērneļus. Dora un Zābaciņš pierunā Trolli nogaršot empanadu Benija kioskā. Zābaciņš uzlaiko Tiko izgudrotus zābakus. Dvīņi priecājas par savu pirmo pinjatu, bet neviens nezina, kā to dabūt vaļā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Megameistars izaicina mēru Greitveju piedalīties triku sacensībās, Rabla komanda būvē satriecošas triku rampas. Kad elektrības traucējumi apdraud Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu, ķepaiņi izmanto lielos braucamos, lai atgrieztu elektrību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sadraudzējas ar kāpuru, kā arī kopā ar Džūdiju uzzina, ka visas pārmaiņas nav sliktas. Brauni piedalās ļoti azartiskā spēlē "Grīda ir lava", bet kurš uzvarēs? Ko par viņiem domās svarīgs viesis?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pievienojieties Padingtonam, kurš kļūst par pirmo lāčunautu, pateicoties Braunu ģimenei. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons salasa dārzā visas kazenes, bet Karija kungs uzskata, ka dažas pienākas viņam. Vai tā ir jāatdod?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons priecājas par pilsētas saimniecības atklāšanu, bet dzīvnieki aizbēg, kad viņš atstāj vaļā vārtus. Vai dzīvniekus pagūs atrast? Bāzs māca Džonatanam un Padingtonam par atkārtoto izmantošanu. Vai par veikumu viņi saņems balvu?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu?

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis uzņem uz klāja Barbabamu, lai atrastu lielkāja mājas.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas uz rotaļlaukumu. Tur ir arī Pepas draugi. Pepai patīk šūpoties, bet Džordžam ne, jo viņš baidās no augstuma. Tāpēc tētis palīdz Džordžam nošļūkt no kalniņa. Tas ir par augstu, un viņš iesprūst.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt. Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Halmoni chooses Jack over Lil to be her Trot dance competition partner, jealous Lil seeks revenge. / Min asks Jack to run a simple errand, but Charlie the gibbon intervenes, sending Jack and Lil chasing after him into the towns abandoned mines.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.
